thread.title: Scotland and Poland both hit with hefty fines for Qualifier incidents
thread.title_full: Scotland and Poland both hit with hefty fines for Qualifier incidents

title: Scotland and Poland both hit with hefty fines for Qualifier incidents
text:
Scotland and Poland both hit with hefty fines for Qualifier incidents 
Irish Examiner Saturday 24th October, 2015 
UEFA has fined the Scottish Football Association EUR20,000 following several incidents during the Euro 2016 qualifier with Poland at Hampden Park earlier this month.A number of flares were set alight in the away section of the stadium and a supporter encroached on to the pitch and delayed the match on October 8, which finished 2-2 and ended the Scots' qualifying hopes, before being led away by stewards.The Scottish FA was also charged with insufficient organisation with regards to the lack of body searches of supporters, as well as blocked stairways, and consequently fined by the UEFA Control,...
